new_response.response_body: This week I am abroad, speaking at a conference, returning after the Thanksgiving holiday on Monday, December 1. During this time, I will not be able to be as responsive as I would like. For a faster response, please contact my assistant, Brooke Williams at williamsb@rmolawyers.com and she can redirect you, or by calling the main line below.

analysis.availability_issue: Returns December 1, hearing is December 3 (2 days - very tight timeline)
analysis.corrected_v2_rating: DOWNGRADED - Large firm (RMO), assumed NO limited scope until verified
analysis.note: Auto-reply doesn't signal interest. Email was sent prematurely per V2.0 strategy (large firm should not have been contacted without verification).

recommended_action.immediate: NO ACTION - Wait to see if substantive response follows
recommended_action.if_desperate: Contact Brooke Williams (assistant) only if no other candidates respond
recommended_action.reason: Large firm (unlikely to offer limited scope) + tight timeline (returns 2 days before hearing) + no substantive interest shown

response_timeline_assessment.assessment: TOO EARLY - Professional attorneys typically respond within 4-24 hours. Current 2.5-hour window is insufficient for meaningful assessment.

strategic_recommendations.immediate: Continue monitoring Gmail every 30-60 minutes for substantive responses
strategic_recommendations.if_no_responses_by_tonight: Prepare phone call strategy for tomorrow morning (November 22)
strategic_recommendations.phase_2_phone_call_trigger: If 0 substantive responses by 10am November 22, initiate phone calls
highest_priority_phone_targets: David A. Shapiro (LA-based, Board Certified) - NEW from expanded search
Ravi Patel (solo, Heggstad specialist, flat fees) - NEW from expanded search
